name: ZoomSphere
slogan: Wrapping ZoomSphere in an identity social media teams will love
description: Take the chaos out of social media management by centralizing all the right tools in one place
text: ZoomSphere is a platform built to make collaboration a breeze. It offers tools like Social Media Scheduler, Workflow Manager, Chat, Notes, and Social Media Analytics, helping users stay organized and on top of their content.</br>The company’s main goal is to reduce complexity and improve productivity by bringing all the essential features together. This solution saves time, cuts down on confusion, and makes sure teams can focus on their business growth.

name: VELOX Media
slogan: Setting new design standards for a digital marketing leader — VELOX Media
description: A leading digital marketing agency driving smarter growth with proven strategies and results
text: VELOX Media is a digital marketing agency delivering measurable results. Specializing in strategy, SEO, paid media, and web development, it helps businesses outpace competitors and achieve sustainable revenue streams.</br>Their team is made up of strategists, developers, and creatives who are passionate about driving success for their clients. They focus on tailored data-driven strategies that work and maximize business ROI.

name: ASI-WEB
slogan: A fresh look at learning through a minimalist identity with impact
description: Innovative startup that helps teachers and students do more with less stress thanks to smart AI tools
text: DigestAI aims to make life easier for educators and students. This AI startup focuses on boosting productivity and taking care of repetitive tasks that may slow down, helping everyone get more out of their learning experience.</br>Such a solution allows people to interact with advanced machine-learning models through an ASI app. Here, teachers can create their own AI tutors that can easily be accessed on platforms like WhatsApp or Microsoft Teams.

name: Zolve
slogan: Making users’ lives greener with a UI/UX that feels like nature’s touch
description: Care for your plants like never before with the app that takes it to the next level
text: Zolve is a plant health management app equipped with the tools to nurture greenery. It’s aimed to provide real-time metrics on leaf hydration, growth rates, and soil moisture, supporting gardeners in making smart decisions.</br>A voice assist feature built into the platform offers personalized insights based on the input query. With all of the perks this plant expert offers, users can simplify flora care routine and help their greenery thrive.

name: Hospity
slogan: Visionary, one-of-a-kind design for an advanced medical platform
description: Redefining healthcare diagnostics with AI-driven solutions for medical professionals and patients
text: Hospity is a company dedicated to revolutionizing healthcare through AI solutions. Its tools are designed to provide fast, accurate, and easy-to-use digital support to medical professionals and patients worldwide.</br>With cutting-edge technologies, the platform simplifies the diagnostic process, ensuring data efficiency and clarity. Users can manage complex cases and gain reliable insights at any time and in any location.

name: Relocate Now
slogan: Relocate Now — a memorable brand story inspired by home
description: All-in-one solution for stress-free global moves where no detail is ever overlooked
text: Relocate Now, a spin-off of the Portuguese advisory firm Westonbridge, is designed to simplify moving to a new country. With years of experience, the service takes care of everything — from paperwork to finding a place to live.</br>The team consists of experts in law, tax, accounting, and management. They work together to prepare the necessary documents, help with pet transporting, and other details to make the relocation effortless and worry-free.

name: ASI-APP
slogan: Designing an AI-powered learning app for modern education needs
description: AI innovation that helps teachers make tutoring accessible and gives students an around-the-clock boost
text: Acton Street, Inc. is an AI startup revolutionizing education with smart digital solutions. Their mission is to support educators and students by automating repetitive tasks, reducing workloads, and making studying more engaging.</br>The company’s ASI app provides custom AI tutoring via chatbots and gamified experiences. Integrated with WhatsApp, Messenger, and Discord, it offers tailored feedback and mastery tracking, blending learning with play.

name: Clawerly
slogan: A clever take on design for a smarter language learning platform
description: A result-driven platform bringing all the tools you need to learn a new language efficiently and enthusiastically
text: Clawerly is a platform that transforms language learning into an exciting experience. By combining interactive lessons with personalized progress tracking, it offers a tailored approach that adapts to the learner’s needs.</br>Supported by a team of expert teachers, Clawerly ensures a structured path to fluency. Its innovative tools and resources cater to all proficiency levels, making it a comprehensive solution for breaking language barriers.

name: Droney
slogan: Distinctive solutions for Droney’s high-tech logistics vision
description: Advanced drone technology tailored for fast, reliable, and sustainable delivery experiences
text: Droney is an innovative logistics platform designed to revolutionize deliveries with cutting-edge drone technology. It provides businesses and individuals with a fast, reliable, and eco-friendly way to move goods.</br>Thanks to the app, drone-based logistics have become accessible to each registered user. Customers can easily schedule deliveries, track shipments in real time, and experience the future of transportation today.

name: Stone
slogan: Building a strong digital presence for a branding studio with a big impact
description: Creative branding studio that drives business growth through powerful storytelling and bold design solutions
text: Stone is a multi-disciplinary brand and creative strategy studio based in Golden, Colorado. Independently owned, it weaves together expertise to support both large, established brands and emerging challenger start-ups.</br>Believing in the power of storytelling, this design agency creates works that resonate and leave a lasting impression. Their approach centers on asking the right questions, proving that good design means good business.

name: Agrinex
slogan: UI/UX for a web platform with all farming needs in one place
description: Data-driven solution for the agriculture future with the necessary tools in just a click away
text: Agrinex brings the latest tech straight to the fields, helping farms work smarter, not harder. It gives real-time data and easy-to-use tools to drive better decisions, grow healthier crops, and keep soil in top shape.</br>This platform is the go-to hub for optimizing every aspect of the process. With a focus on sustainability and efficiency, it’s here to transform the way people farm, making it easier and more productive.

name: Umano
slogan: Unlocking the full potential of the Umano product — from design to development
description: Tech analytics company that provides real-time insights into teamwork practices for continuous growth
text: Umano is an Australian tech company that aims to enhance cooperation between team members in different spheres. Its platform provides all the necessary data for analyzing current work on projects, leading to overall success.</br>With a “plug and play” approach, its space integrates with existing tools like Jira, Slack, and GitHub. This data fuels automated guidance, helping self-managed agile teams continuously improve and reach peak performance.

name: Versus
slogan: Strong and memorable brand solutions winning over tennis lovers
description: A platform that inspires tennis enthusiasts to connect, compete, and level up together
text: Versus is a platform that aims to help tennis players take their game to the next level. It allows users to set up personal accounts, register for tournaments, and get top-notch advice from the best in the sports world.</br>Here, people can join the community and connect with fellow tennis lovers. This platform is dedicated to motivating starting-out players or supporting those who are already a pro and compete at their best.

name: Nettra Media
slogan: Animating the digital dreams for the Nettra Media website
description: Digital marketing services company crafts business success stories with lead generation that packs a punch
text: Nettra Media is a marketing company based in the US. Their main focus lies on offering lead generation services that really kick, with a team of 18 marketing professionals who bring knowledge and expertise in various domains.</br>This agency helps credit unions, banks, and service-based businesses get noticed and grow big. For clients seeking a more strategic touch, they act as an outsourced CMO, zeroing in on strategy, implementation, and optimization.

name: NanoCorp
slogan: Designing tomorrow’s trading experience for NanoCorp’s platform
description: A dynamic platform with advanced services for storing and  exchanging digital assets
text: NanoCorp is an online platform designed to facilitate cryptocurrency trading in a safe and user-friendly environment. It caters to both seasoned and novice users in the field, offering a range of features to suit their needs.</br>With its secure space and intuitive navigation, the app simplifies work with assets, making it accessible to a broad audience. People can easily execute transactions, monitor market trends, and manage their portfolios with ease.

name: FlowsApp
slogan: Turning chaos into order with smart design solutions for FlowsApp
description: Organizing work processes and achieving goals with one click in one place
text: FlowsApp is the go-to solution for task and project management. With intuitive features and smooth integration of additional tools, it helps users efficiently organize their work no matter the size of the project.</br>Focused on teams of all sizes, this application allows one to tackle big tasks, manage daily routines, and stay on track. Managers get a lot of options and can add teams, assign roles, and monitor the number of hours spent.

name: Fertile
slogan: Cultivating an appetizing platform for Fertile’s produce delivery
description: From farm to family — a basket of delicious and healthy veggies just a click away
text: Fertile is an agricultural company that grows and supplies organic food. They champion sustainable farming, using the best practices that are good for people and the planet, and contribute to a greener and happier future.</br>The vivid and easy-to-use platform allows people to browse the assortment, place an order, and even track its status. With these features, customers can get eco-friendly and fresh vegetables from vast fields to their tables.

name: Plantons
slogan: Building botanical platform identity with smart design choices
description: Growing plants made easy and smart with the help of a new high-tech assistant
text: Plantons is a tech-driven platform for botanical enthusiasts and plant lovers. Through innovative care solutions, it revolutionizes the way people cultivate thriving ecoscapes, regardless of their experience level.</br>The service includes personalized recommendations tailored to users’ specific greenery and lifestyle. By using this app, everyone can watch the plant collection flourish, transforming their home into a lush green oasis.

name: Claud
slogan: Making a lasting impression with a playful touch for the Claud brand identity
description: Gaming with excitement, where every tap could turn into treasure
text: Claud is an interactive online spot in the world of crypto gaming. This innovative platform allows players to sign up and try a thrilling challenge, where the main goal is to click as quickly as possible.</br>It’s a place where people can spend time with engaging gameplay that keeps users coming back for more. Thousands of gamers enjoy good experiences, creating a unique community vibe inside the platform.

name: Mealivery
slogan: Bringing fresh air to Mealivery design for a juicy look that sticks in the user's mind
description: A combination of easy functionality and user-centric design is just an app away
text: Mealivery is the app that’s changing grocery delivery by focusing on quality, convenience, and a personal touch. This platform grants users access to fresh, handpicked ingredients from favorite local markets with prices that can be seen right on the display.</br>It’s easy to schedule deliveries directly through the app so that customers can plan meals around their lives. With the real-time tracking feature, users can even see the courier’s journey from market to doorstep, ensuring peace of mind with every order.

name: BeHired
slogan: BeHired — creating first impression through design and technology
description: A fusion of bold branding and web creativity for the recruitment company
text: BeHired is a platform that connects users with global job opportunities. This website is designed for both seekers and employers, simplifying the process of finding and posting vacancies. To unlock the door for the perfect job opportunity, all users have to do is sign up.</br>The dashboard offers personalized recommendations that match the searcher’s skills, interests, and career goals. Also, it displays company ratings and reviews, empowering users with the insights needed to make informed decisions about their next career move.

name: HiCloud
slogan: Building pixel aesthetic for HiCloud identity block-by-block
description: Architectural mastery in data storage solutions
text: HiCloud is a secure data storage and management platform offering cutting-edge solutions for virtualized security. Its aim is to safeguard people’s digital space while ensuring efficiency and reliability in asset retention.</br>With intuitive drag-and-drop features, the website simplifies navigations through files and folders. Plus, easy-to-use tools empower users to organize , access, and share information with both comfort and high protection from unauthorized access.

name: Amateur
slogan: Designing a center stage for the Amateur artists
description: Personalization of a new digital environment for music lovers
text: Amateur is a music publishing and distribution platform designed for musicians and their audiences worldwide. With this app, people can enjoy songs, playlists, or podcasts across various genres. Its rich feature set helps to explore new authentic voices and tracks in the evolving music landscape.</br>Incorporated with streaming services, this platform provides a supportive ecosystem for newcomers at every stage of their journey. Thus, they can upload or share recordings with a simple and intuitive interface. Plus, the app uses personalized recommendations to connect users with artists they’ll truly love.

name: Felyx
slogan: Fast multilingual website for the green e-scooter rent platform
description: Experience the joy of emission-free travel with an e-scooter rental for a greener tomorrow
text: Felyx is an Amsterdam-based rental platform where users can download an application to conveniently locate and rent electric scooters. The service aims to facilitate faster and easier urban transportation.</br>All by enabling people to rent e-scooters straight through their smartphones. The use of felyx devices not only allows for smooth traveling but also promotes a more sustainable urban environment.

name: Develop Health
slogan: Develop Health — building a Swiss-style healthcare landing page in the healthcare industry
description: The top-notch platform that reduces clinician workload
text: Develop Health is a US company focused on building better medication utilization infrastructure. Their key goal is to optimize healthcare processes and improve patient outcomes with innovative AI technology.</br>To simplify medication access, they work on auto-filling prior authorization forms and using patient data. With high-fidelity digital infrastructure, the company develops health through engineering.

name: OceanStream
slogan: Exploring the seas with OceanStream hydroacoustic data software
description: A new era in marine data analysis by PineView and Halo Lab collaborative solution
text: PineView is an independent software engineering consultancy based in Norway. Since 2014, they specialize in full-stack web application development, deployment, and testing. The team aimed to create an open-source platform dedicated to ocean research.</br>This company focused on innovation in hydroacoustic data analysis to provide tools for real-time data analysis in remote marine areas. By doing so, they contribute to the scientific community and pave the way for discoveries and solutions in ocean research.

slogan: 89transfers — accessible UI/UX design to simplify the booking process
description: Whether you’re traveling solo, with friends, or as a family, 89transfers caters to all your transportation needs
text: A go-to platform for booking transportation services across Mallorca. They provide a convenient price calculation tool and a smart system that determines the ideal pickup and drop-off times based on the flight schedule.</br>With years of experience in private transfers from Palma Airport, the company stands as the top choice in Mallorca. No wonder, even before our collaboration, they had quite a good customer satisfaction rate — 4.6, as per Trustpilot.

name: BLOOP
slogan: BLOOP — Web App Backend and Discord Bot Development for a Data Trading Platform
description: Don’t let WEB3 insights fade away. Join the BLOOP revolution and unlock the power of shared knowledge.
text: A B2B2C mobile-first search tool that helps WEB3 community connectors share knowledge across social platforms. It functions as an advanced bookmark archive.</br>The platform allows users to add interesting websites or posts to Discord, make collections, share them, and discuss with others.

name: TutorChase
slogan: A world-class learning UI/UX and development for TutorChase
description: Premium tutoring platform for students who want to apply to Oxford, Harvard, and other top-ranked universities
text: TutorChase is a UK-based online tutoring company offering premium academic assistance. Their team consists of the world’s best teachers dedicated to helping students across various educational levels.</br>They cover all subjects for GCSEs, A-Levels, IB, AP, and SAT to achieve university entry. TutorChase makes exam preparation easy and provides a pathway into the UK and US’s top universities.

name: Wingly
slogan: Wingly’s empowering design that soars above traditional banking
description: Financial freedom with a sky-high bank platform
text: Wingly is a brand-new banking platform designed for modern life. It provides finance enthusiasts with cutting-edge tools and resources to navigate the complexities of the money world with confidence and ease.</br>With no intricate patterns to follow, you can save for that next big adventure or plan for the future. The service’s sleek and user-friendly interface aims to provide users with lightning-fast operations and fit their busy schedules.

name: Wildbank
slogan: Crafting a brand identity for a financial company that banks on Earth’s future
description: Bank with confidence, knowing that your money is making a difference in the world
text: Wildbank is a new kind of online banking with crucial services and a passion for conservation. It offers a variety of products, including checking and savings accounts, credit cards, and loans. This platform is committed to sustainability and uses 100% renewable energy to power its operations.</br>The unique nature of this company lies in its mission. With every swipe of a Wildbank card, a percentage of users’ purchases helps protect African wildlife. This means that customers can do their usual banking and save some of the world’s most endangered animals at the same time.

name: Owncap
slogan: Building a memorable Owncap app identity for your effective financial management
description: Your financial navigator — a modern tool for a better tomorrow
text: Owncap is a management platform available for anyone, from money managers to financial newcomers. No more guesswork or tedious manual tracking — the intuitive interface ensures that every expense is logged and categorized with precision.</br>With this app, users can save more and control their money. Are you spending too much on coffee or don’t remember your bills? No problem. Owncap will send notifications directly to the device and show you how to focus on achieving financial goals.

name: Virage.AI
slogan: Virage.AI — brand design and intuitive interface for the best biking journeys
description: Boost your ride and pave the way with a smart assistant — a new biking experience for cycle enthusiasts
text: Virage.AI is a cycling platform accessible across all devices. Its primary goal is to enhance route planning and deliver crucial data, such as distance, speed, time, and heart rate, in the most convenient and digestible format.</br>The AI navigation system provides turn-by-turn directions to keep cyclists focused on their ride. Apart from that, the platform allows for exchanging destinations and useful tips — all to ensure users have fun and achieve better results together.

name: eSport company
slogan: A web application from scratch for a new player in esports world
description: Your ticket to successful predictions, backed by AI expertise — say goodbye to guesswork and hello to esports success.
text: A platform for esports enthusiasts to track the performance of their favorite teams in CS:GO, Dota 2, and LoL. Here, users can engage with games and explore detailed players’ profiles, following their progress.</br>Due to the power of unique algorithms, data analytics, and real-time updates, the platform keeps fans informed about the latest match statistics, player performances, and tournament results.

name: LinkByCar
slogan: LinkByCar — adaptable design for AI-driven vehicle operation startup
description: The top player in the French transportation market owing to the power of vehicle-generated open data.
text: LinkByCar is a SaaS startup that created a tool to collect, process, and aggregate data from vehicles. With the use of AI technology, it can predict the behavior of any vehicle — all to ensure you safely get to your destination.</br>The company cooperates with popular car manufacturers, including Stellantis, Mercedes, and BMW. With an extensive network already in a place, they have serious potential to expand across all of Europe.

name: Happy
slogan: Happy — conceptual web storytelling for the dental business in Israel
text: The client reached us to create Happy from scratch. They wanted a product that resonates with their customers — Israelis of all ages and backgrounds. For this, the client requested branding, design, and development services to present their new user-friendly platform.</br>Halo Lab offered the client an all-in-one digital package: website design and development, along with logo and branding design. With meanings and functionality in mind, we crafted various features and blocks to improve user experience, prioritizing minimalism in navigation and structure.

name: PRAISEWORTHY
slogan: Revamped design for the employee recognition platform
text: The client sought to elevate their digital presence by showcasing depth and striking visuals. In light of this, we had to swiftly design a powerful app along with a clean website, ensuring their product was presented in an easily digestible manner.</br>Our team optimized navigation, accessibility, and user interactions to create a user-friendly digital platform. The resulting work features a seamless experience for users and unique branding and design solutions that fit both the app and site.

name: TraceSafe
slogan: TraceSafe — a solid design for the leading provider of IoT solutions
text: TraceSafe’s rebranding aimed to reflect how the company has evolved over time, helping them to adapt to a new target market. This involved a complete rebranding and conceptual redesign to attract a business-oriented audience.</br>Our team conducted a rebranding and redesign for the client’s landing page, showcasing their new products in line with market trends. We also improved sections for financials and press releases to facilitate investor access to crucial information.

name: NYRA.HEALTH
slogan: Smooth data presentation and new brand vision for nyra health
text: The client required a user-friendly and strategic interface for a platform used by medical professionals to manage and monitor neurological patients’ recovery. Also, they wanted to unify branding across their patients’ app and web platform for medical staff, showcasing professionalism, convenience, and consistency.</br>Our team ensured an intuitive UI for the nyra health web platform, simplifying patient data presentation. We restyled their iconic brain-logo, while refining its design for a more established look. Additionally, our team integrated visual elements from the web platform to ensure consistency across the client’s products.

name: Hair & Skin
slogan: Sleek and bold visual style for Hair & Skin beauty-centric provider
text: The client aimed to boost lead generation through performance-oriented design. Besides, the site must be scalable, as it would be implemented on a headless CMS. Finally, it was crucial to provide users with intuitive navigation and present HAIR & SKIN as a modern and trustworthy company.</br>To overcome these challenges, we created a seamless cross-device experience. Streamlined navigation and clear CTAs should encourage appointment bookings, helping to generate more leads, while sophisticated typography, colors, and photos emphasize HAIR & SKIN’s focus on innovation.

name: Spaces
slogan: Embracing the future: modern design for Spaces Urbanistic Institute
text: Spaces is a research and education center that studies urban and spatial development, infrastructure planning, and city life. They work on these subjects within the context of current global processes and power relations.</br>The institute resolves complex challenges and finds forward-thinking solutions to shape the future of cities. Spaces provide inclusive urban development policies that prioritize the well-being and prosperity of citizens.

name: The Variable
slogan: The Variable — interactive design for those who fight indifference
text: The Variable is an independent creative agency that specializes in providing design services focused on marketing and advertising materials. They drive growth for today, which ensures growth for tomorrow. Because of such a unique approach, The Variable collaborated with globally-recognized brands, like Electrolux, Scotts Miracle-Gro, Char-Broil, NAPA Auto Parts, BASF, Nestle, and P&G, helping companies across the globe relentlessly combat their greatest challenge — consumer indifference.

name: Spotbusiness
slogan: Fresh & sunny identity for Spotbusiness coworking space
text: Spotbusiness is a real estate agency that provides both physical and virtual shared workspaces suitable for any type of business. Located in Casablanca, one of Morocco’s largest cities, the company offers bright and spacious offices with customization and flexible leasing terms. At Spotbusiness, everyone can find a well-organized and pleasant work environment while enjoying the stunning sea views, fresh air, and warm Moroccan sun.

name: Bling
slogan: Bling Jewelry Store — timeless beauty between vintage and novel
description: Timeless beauty digitally brought to life through vibrant, high-tech innovation
text: Bling is the place where contemporary meets classic. They offer a wide range of chains, bracelets, anklets, and rings, from vintage to modern, which are sure to add a graceful touch to the appearance of every jewelry fan.</br>Also, this platform uses cutting-edge 3D modeling technology. Thanks to this innovation, it becomes possible to showcase an explosion of color and shimmers with gemstones, pearls, and diamonds in stunningly vivid detail.

name: Mixmo
slogan: Mixmo: shaking up the music scene with a bold and colorful image
text: Mixmo is a next-gen music publishing and distribution platform that revolutionizes the industry by utilizing blockchain technology. Their core concept is to foster a community of artists and fans where everyone can listen, add, and share favorite songs. By adopting a decentralized approach to music distribution, Mixmo is setting the stage for a fresh wave of creativity and cooperation, bringing together musicians and enthusiasts in a more fulfilling and impactful way.

name: Go Trade
slogan: Futuristic and sleek design for the universal investment platform
description: Confidence in your financial future, even in unpredictable market conditions
text: The Go Trade platform helps people be confident about their financial stability, even in volatile market conditions. It offers a range of investment opportunities customized to suit users’ budgets and aspirations.</br>The platform caters to all types of investors, providing tailored recommendations that match your unique objectives. Simply put, Go Trade lets everyone start investing in their future with assurance and peace of mind.

name: HeyTutor
slogan: HeyTutor — smart design for online tutoring platform with $30M revenue
text: HeyTutor is an online platform that establishes effective communication between tutors, students, and knowledge centers. Based on particular learning needs and preferences, tutees worldwide can find suitable educators to fill gaps in various niches. To get such a “smart match,” tutors can create custom profiles, set their own rates and policies, and browse for nearby jobs. After each session, educators are reviewed by HeyTutor, which enables the online platform to increase efficiency and drive even more positive results from the learning process.

name: Bookclub24
slogan: Digital rebirth of Bookclub24 — #1 German online library for book collectors
text: Bookclub24 is a platform dedicated to book lovers and collectors from around the globe, with a strong focus on German, Austrian, and Swiss audiences. It offers a unique service for users to register and manage their collection of books in a digitized format that can be shared with others. The platform is dedicated to preserving the knowledge contained in books and making it accessible to buy or exchange for everyone. Through Bookclub24, it’s easy to showcase book collections, connect with like-minded people, and inspire other literature fans to do the same.

name: Wrangle
slogan: Wrangle — dynamic design for streamlined business management
text: Wrangle is a powerful management tool developed by Wranglesoft, a North Carolina-based corporation. It helps companies to map and automate their employees’ work, offering seamless integration with Slack, Microsoft Teams, and other business messaging apps. By partnering with Wrangle, companies gain access to many exciting benefits, including the ability to identify and resolve management issues within their preferred chat platform.</br>Overall, Wrangle is a perfect tool to level up your work game, streamline communication, and significantly enhance productivity. With this system, team members can easily request approvals, assign tasks, and track specific requests. Besides, Wrangle provides real-time notifications, a transparent dashboard, and the ability to search open and closed tickets, ensuring that employees are always informed and aligned.

name: WINDOW SEARCH
slogan: How we helped Window make shopping fast and fun again
text: Window is an efficient online shopping assistant that scans apparel websites and returns a curated selection based on the user’s size, style, budget, and other customized filters. By creating a machine learning profile with this information, the Window search engine can automatically find the perfect clothes for every person, saving their time, money, and energy. The goal of this project is to make shopping fast and fun again for each wallet size and body shape.

name: Catalyze AI
slogan: Catalyze — user-friendly website for your partner in growth and success
text: Catalyze AI is a cutting-edge platform that leverages predictive analytics to empower financial services and real estate professionals by identifying their target customers. With advanced machine learning and data analysis techniques, it provides deep insights, customized recommendations, and efficient sales strategies for business development. The platform was created to simplify the complex process of customer engagement and help users easily achieve their business goals.

name: Gig Share
slogan: Geometry in color: high-contrast design for Gig Share platform
description: Efficient and secure file sharing for businesses collaborating on the go
text: The Gig Share platform simplifies the process of sharing large files and ideas. It offers an infrastructure for storing and transmitting data with colleagues or clients through collaboration networks like Slack and Zoom.</br>It prioritizes security and takes care of potential issues such as data breaches and high traffic volume. This makes the platform a smart choice for businesses seeking to share large files with multiple stakeholders.

name: Alukaze
slogan: Alukaze — combining wind and metal for a truly striking effect
text: Alukaze is a product brand that specializes in crafting custom high-quality fenestration solutions that are both soundproof and energy-efficient. European acoustic performance, Singaporean safety standards, and the design of Alukaze products together create a harmonious balance between functionality and aesthetics. By employing these practices, the brand stands out from competitors, which makes Alukaze one of the best choices on the market.</br>To keep such a pace, the client entrusted us to reveal the Alukaze spirit through modern brand and design techniques. Unlike many similar companies, they aimed to get not only a commercially successful product but one with a customer-oriented approach, lightness, and progressiveness. Fortunately, our team knew how to reach all these goals, so we instantly got to conjuring a meaningful and conceptual design for Alukaze.

name: We-go
slogan: We-go — a new digital life for a perinatal wellness center
text: We-go is a unique wellness center for mothers and infants located in the heart of Asia. By combining traditional and cutting-edge technologies, it provides new mothers and their babies with vitamin-rich food, post-pregnancy procedures, and special care. The treatment is carried out under constant medical supervision and in luxury conditions to help mothers and infants recover after physical and emotional stress.</br>To popularize their services worldwide, the client appointed us to develop a comfortable website that reflects the We-go center’s vision. They highlighted a need to make it not only easy to use but also elegant and calm to create a sense of relaxation and unity with nature. Our goal was to meet this target, paying attention to the client’s requirements, utilizing efficient development tools, and incorporating trendy design solutions.

name: Vestox
slogan: High-contrast design for Vestox management system
description: Guiding businesses toward sustainable growth with expert financial insights
text: Vestox is a financial management system promoting long-term sustainability for businesses. It helps clients succeed by teaching them to make optimal decisions in unique situations, maximizing financial resources.</br>For this purpose, the Vestox management system offers different services. These include diversifying investment portfolios, setting financial goals, and keeping clients informed about the hottest market trends.

name: QuirkChat
slogan: Quirkchat — Swipe right on geek & Fleek design solutions
text: QuirkChat is a collaboration platform for millions of geeks all over the world. It was founded in 2017, with the main office in Durham, North California. QuirkChat is perfect for finding YOUR people — with similar interests, tastes, and worldviews. Here, you can be yourself and create your own fandom, regardless of skin color, gender, or religion. QuirkChat is open to every passionate geek and hobbyist who wants to have some fun building a quirky and cozy social network.

name: Juo
slogan: The power of gradient — a completely new image for Juo’s design house
description: Every room deserves a unique and thoughtful touch, crafted to match your vision
text: JUO is a design studio that provides a creative environment to bring furniture and interior design ideas to life. The platform has enchanted people with extraordinary solutions and customized details for any space.</br>With JUO, users can create stylish and cozy designs that reflect unique personalities and tastes. No matter the main goal, this online platform has the expertise and experience to make each vision a reality.

name: AIG investments
slogan: Branding for impact: How we revamped the AIG investments platform
description: Modern platform that redefines the way young people engage with modern art and NFTs
text: AIG Investments is a high-tech project that seeks to broaden modern art and popularize NFT culture. To offer a wide range of digital masterpieces, this platform has established partnerships with various artists and galleries.</br>However, attracting a young, tech-savvy audience required a fresh and innovative branding and design approach. At this stage, Halo Lab fully immersed itself in the project, bringing our expertise to the forefront.

name: Raven.gg
slogan: Raven.gg — the leading brand for custom esports clothing design
text: Raven is a leading brand when it comes to designing and manufacturing Esports apparel thanks to their innovation and strong ties with some of the biggest global Esports teams. What sets them apart is that they produce premium customized products, provide a unique customer service experience and continuously innovate their brand.The client approached us looking for a complete redevelopment of their website. They’ve been using its core backend since 2014 and felt that the time has come to better reflect their established position in the market and their premium brand identity. Our task was to help Raven with those ambitious goals by enhancing their platform.

name: Databest
slogan: Databest — Business intelligence that leaves competitors behind
description: From IT to healthcare — data-powered solutions crafted for all business needs
text: Databest platform developed to help businesses communicate with a target audience through marketing analysis and data collection. Its toolbox includes data collection, inspection, transformation, cleansing, and more.</br>With it, any business can get professional digital treatment and marketing optimization, no matter its niche — IT, media, healthcare, education, etc. This allows Databest to be the best at taking care of every client’s needs.

name: Booster
slogan: Booster — A modern platform for all your business-boosting needs
description: Data-driven strategies that help businesses achieve higher efficiency and results
text: Booster is a B2B platform dedicated to increasing the revenue and efficiency of enterprises. Focusing on trade analytics, consultations, and commerce-related services, it empowers businesses to turn visitors into leads.</br>By leveraging cutting-edge tools, Booster helps companies grow their customer base and cultivate long-term brand loyalty. The platform offers tailored solutions to maximize profitability and enhance business performance.

name: Skillex
slogan: Skillex — A place where learning thrives and triumphs
description: A place where everyone can learn, grow, and connect across creative and technical fields
text: Skillex is a platform focused on facilitating practical learning experiences. Here, aspiring and established designers, developers, photographers, writers, and marketers can find top-notch courses, guides, and teachers.</br>This hub also offers a welcoming community of great personalities and experts. Students can choose from hundreds of online courses in various fields, including data science, art, programming, marketing, and many others.

name: Mighty Buildings
slogan: Mighty Buildings — sustainable 3D printed houses of the future
text: Mighty Buildings is one of the first companies to start 3D-printing homes commercially. The company’s technology makes it possible to create residential modules of complex shapes, which are often impossible to produce in the traditional way.</br>Our main goal was to create a responsive web application and a website, allowing users to select and customize their new modular homes with just a few clicks. One could see it as a constructor for grown

name: Gypto
slogan: Gypto — a minimalist and to-the-point design that is all business
description: Simplicity at its finest — Gypto delivers fast, simple solutions for real results
text: Gypto is a no-nonsense cryptocurrency exchange with a focus on speed and actual results. One of its standout features is the Gypto Cards, offering the ability to spend cryptocurrency anywhere, anytime, with ease and convenience.</br>Simplicity is at the core of Gypto’s approach. The platform provides all the essential tools for cryptocurrency trading without overwhelming users with complicated functions, making high-level trading accessible and efficient.

name: Pure Harmony
slogan: Pure Harmony - Celebrating beauty and self-care with elegance
description: Inclusive beauty company that nurtures, protects, and enhances every individual
text: Since beauty is all-encompassing, Pure Harmony offers natural skin and body care products for all ages, genders, and walks of life. With a focus on inclusivity and quality, all products nurture each individual’s unique beauty.</br>The brand is built on the concepts of purity, abundance, and genuine care, aiming to make everyone feel embraced by its offerings. This company strives to create a sense of harmony and well-being in every product experience.

name: Cyboro
slogan: Cyboro — Stylish and minimalist guardian of your data
description: Now, it’s possible to protect what matters most: your data, privacy, and peace of mind
text: In today’s world, data is a valuable commodity, making it a prime target for malicious actors. While tech giants may be trustworthy, it may not extend to others who could gather and sell your information for nefarious purposes.</br>Protecting your data and your customer’s information is not only possible but essential. Cyboro steps in, offering robust solutions to shield against these threats and ensure privacy and security in a connected digital landscape.

name: Mite
slogan: How we helped overhaul the charity platform serving thousands in need
text: Mite.org is a US-based public charity that collects donations for worthy causes worldwide. The foundation curates many impactful projects, each with a specific purpose and amount to be raised. Since they collect through their website, the founders wanted us to redesign and rework it to better serve the foundation’s goals and make it easier for both the sponsors and the Mite curators to help people.</br>Initially, Mite’s representative approached us with a request for a simple makeover. They felt their website back then looked outdated, with rough branding and not entirely clear messaging. But what we ultimately delivered was a full-fledged application with payment functionality, newsletters, user profiles, search, and more.

name: Sight Banking
slogan: Sight Banking — An identity you can bank on
description: Revolutionizing digital banking through innovation, simplicity, and communication
text: Sight is a digital bank with a focus on innovation, ease of use, and communication. The project uses advanced technologies and best industry practices, with all the banking details being mere taps away for the clients.</br>It goes without saying that the identity, image, and design of such a company should clearly communicate these goals. We step on board to highlight Sight’s commitment to being at the forefront of digital banking.

name: Nature Morte Gallery
slogan: Nature Morte Gallery — Design worthy of framing
description: Creating a place where classical masterpieces meet contemporary expression
text: Nature Morte is an online gallery for all things art and culture, which is why it has to resemble a work of art itself. With a mission to make art accessible and engaging, the company curates a diverse collection.</br>The idea behind the project is to allow both average users and connoisseurs to enjoy and draw inspiration from the greatest classical masterpieces of mankind while also giving more publicity to contemporary artists.

name: Lips Love
slogan: A spectacular take on branding for a million-dollar look
description: A beauty brand thoughtfully created to inspire confidence and celebrate natural beauty
text: Lips Love is aimed at empowering ladies to express their natural beauty through premium lip care products. With thousands of women enhancing their looks with these tools daily, the brand continues to make an impact.</br>But this company needed an identity truly connected with its audience, emphasizing personality and individuality. Our team came in to create a powerful and striking identity that resonated with the brand’s mission and vision.

name: Bricr estate
slogan: Clean and strict look for an ambitious real-estate solution
description: A real estate platform built to unlock market potential for everyone
text: Bricr offers an all-in-one suite for real estate professionals, investors, brokers, and housing developers. Their customer-focused platform is designed to unlock market potential for real estate owners, buyers, and tenants.</br>However, the company needed a brand identity that matched its goals and vision. That’s where we stepped in to create a fitting brand presence that would elevate their market position and resonate with the target audience.

name: Casefair
slogan: A classy identity for the top-of-the-line recruitment solution
description: Advanced AI-driven recruitment technology that transforms how companies hire talent
text: Casefair is a recruitment platform designed to help companies find top talent through AI-driven screening and candidate insights. By easing the workload of HR departments, it ensures they only deal with qualified candidates.</br>The platform works by having candidates solve theoretical problems, which are automatically graded based on their approach to real-world scenarios. This way, HR teams can then quickly identify those who meet their needs.

name: PETZ
slogan: A cheerful take on branding to help house our furry friends
description: A lovely initiative focused on providing homes and care for stray animals
text: PETZ wants to help all stray animals find loving companionship and, most importantly, a forever home. This product is created for people who want to adopt a pet, allowing them to choose that very special friend.</br>The team behind the project goes beyond just matching adopters with pets. They fully support people with the necessary care information to ensure both them and their charges are as comfortable and happy as possible.

name: Cloud Native Rejekts
slogan: The conference for the best of the rejected submissions from KubeCon
text: Cloud Native Rejekts is an alternative IT conference platform for people who could not take the floor at the KubeCon conference for whatever reason. They openly refer to themselves as a B-side conference, and there’s nothing derogatory about that definition. On the contrary, this is exactly how they promote and market the platform, with their speakers taking pride in the unlikely title of Rejekts.

name: Sync
slogan: Bringing order to sales chaos with bold design and human focus
description: Top-tier sales intelligence platform built for productive team coordination
text: Sync is a platform that helps sales teams cut through operational noise. It centralizes workflows, automates progress tracking, and turns scattered data into clear, real-time insights across teams and pipelines.</br>With sharp interface logic and smart analytics, the app replaces tangled systems with clarity. It gives managers tighter control, uncovers revenue gaps faster, and helps teams hit targets without wasting time on manual reporting.
